interpretation: The "stop button" card represents a need to pause and take a break. This may be a time to stop a project or relationship that is not serving you, or to take a step back and reevaluate your priorities. It can also indicate a need to set boundaries and say "no" to things that are draining your energy. The "stop button" reminds us that taking breaks and setting limits is essential for our well-being and productivity. Associated keywords include pause, break, boundaries, evaluation, and rest. This card can also symbolize a need for closure or an end to a situation that is no longer serving you. Trust your intuition and take the time you need to rest and recharge.
